body: I dont really enjoy loli mangas for the reason that when i read them i feel bad. I also dont really like BDSM. I can definitely  see people liking this kind of mangas but is just one that is not for me. Being neutral, It's not a bad manga and is very well drawn. Overall a good manga that i dont especially like.
